entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
